column5: I tried calling them and searched the web for store hours with no luck.  Are they open on the weekend?  I lost a nut on my Abu Garcia Record, the main one that holds on the power handle.  Where else could I get this part fast?  Looking to get back on the water Monday.
Did you try 905-277-3595 Last time I was there the guy told me has was open weekends during the summer.
I believe Aikman's closes at 12 on Saturdays.
